&dhpackage;
-v
url
DESCRIPTION
This manual page documents briefly the &dhpackage; command.
This manual page was written for the &debian; distribution because the original program does not have a manual page.
&dhpackage; is a multi-platform lightweight web browser. Its aim is to provide comprehensive rendering of HTML 4 with CSS 2 in a small resource footprint while remaining fast.
OPTIONS
-v
Enable verbose logging.
url
Initial URL to open.
